name: Electric Drive System
description: Electric motors, reduction gearsets, and drive unit assemblies.

name: Energy Storage
description: High-voltage battery packs, modules, and structural enclosures.

name: Power Electronics
description: Inverters, converters, and high-voltage control electronics.

name: Charging System
description: Onboard chargers, charge ports, and charging interface components.

name: Thermal Management
description: Cooling and heating systems for batteries and drive units.

name: Body
description: Body panels, exterior trim, bumpers, glass, mirrors, and related hardware.

name: Chassis
description: Vehicle structural components and battery-integrated frames.

name: Suspension & Steering
description: Suspension systems supporting vehicle weight and dynamics.

name: Braking System
description: Brake hardware integrated with regenerative braking systems.

name: Wheels & Tyres
description: Wheels, tyres, wheel bearings, hubs, and related mounting hardware.

name: Ignition
description: Start/enable and control components such as relays, sensors, and control modules.

name: Electrical & Control
description: Vehicle control units, sensors, and low-voltage electrical systems.
